languages.text: "Вы знаете, что готов". {n}Соломон твердо кладет руку на оружие, и Глейто вытягивается в струну, вторя решимости хозяина.{/n}
"You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы знаете, что готов". {n}Соломон твердо кладет руку на оружие, и Глейто вытягивается в струну, вторя решимости хозяина.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}
"You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}
"You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}
"You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}
"You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

languages.text: 「もちろんです」{n}ソロモーンは力強く武器に手を置き、グライトも主人の決意に呼応するように直立の姿勢を取った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです」{n}ソロモーンは力強く武器に手を置き、グライトも主人の決意に呼応するように直立の姿勢を取った。{/n}

languages.text: "Das wisst Ihr doch." {n}Solomorne legt eine Hand fest auf seine Waffe, und Glaito nimmt Haltung an, um die Entschlossenheit seines Herren widerzuspiegeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das wisst Ihr doch." {n}Solomorne legt eine Hand fest auf seine Waffe, und Glaito nimmt Haltung an, um die Entschlossenheit seines Herren widerzuspiegeln.{/n}

languages.text: « Bien évidemment. » {n}Solomorne place sa main sur la crosse de son arme et Glaito se redresse, aux ordres, véritable miroir de la détermination de son maître.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien évidemment. » {n}Solomorne place sa main sur la crosse de son arme et Glaito se redresse, aux ordres, véritable miroir de la détermination de son maître.{/n}

languages.text: «Sabe que sí». {n}Solomorne coloca su mano con firmeza sobre su arma, y Glaito se pone firme, haciéndose eco de la determinación de su amo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sabe que sí». {n}Solomorne coloca su mano con firmeza sobre su arma, y Glaito se pone firme, haciéndose eco de la determinación de su amo.{/n}

languages.text: “我准备好了，你最清楚。”{n}索罗蒙握紧了手中的武器，格雷托立正站好，回应着主人的决意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我准备好了，你最清楚。”{n}索罗蒙握紧了手中的武器，格雷托立正站好，回应着主人的决意。{/n}

languages.text: "Cevabım belli." {n}Solomorne, elini sıkıca silahının üzerine koyuyor. Glaito da efendisinin kararlılığını yansıtarak hazırda bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You know I am." {n}Solomorne places his hand firmly on his weapon, and Glaito stands at attention, echoing his master's determination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Cevabı biliyorsun." {n}Solomorne, elini sıkıca silahının üzerine koyuyor ve Glaito, efendisinin kararlılığını yansıtarak hazırda bekliyor.{/n}
